title: Login button not responding
description: Users are unable to click the login button on the homepage.

title: Payment not processing
description: Customers report failed transaction attempts when using credit cards.

title: Broken product images
description: Images on product details page fail to load.

title: Search results not accurate
description: Search feature not returning relevant results.

title: Slow website loading
description: Website performance is degraded during peak periods.

title: Unable to reset password
description: Password reset link does not send email.

title: Profile image not updating
description: Updating profile image does not reflect changes.

title: Contact form submission error
description: Form throws validation error even when fields are correct.

title: Order history not visible
description: Users cannot see past orders in their dashboard.

title: Email notifications delayed
description: Order confirmation emails are delayed by several hours.

title: Shopping cart not updating
description: Added items appear missing after refresh.

title: Language change not applied
description: Selected language resets after navigating pages.
